title: Items
content: u journey through the story and progress through the game, you will meet many vendors that will sell a variety of items and carry a vast stock. Many Merchants in Baldur's Gate 3 have a partially randomized selection of items on sale from their overall item pool. This primarily applies to Scrolls, Potions, Food, and Weapons with a +1 enhancement bonus.
